statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE agent_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_date FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'Call' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT agent_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM CustomerInteractions GROUP BY agent_id ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE customer_id = 'a89098cd-2123-45ef-8976-bc2345678901' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT agent_id, count(*) FROM CustomerInteractions GROUP BY agent_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, interaction_date FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'call' AND interaction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY interaction_date LIMIT 10;
SELECT agent_id, interaction_type, interaction_notes FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_notes ILIKE '%complaint%' ORDER BY agent_id, interaction_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Email' AND interaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_description FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id WHERE customers.customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id ORDER BY interactions.interaction_date DESC;

SELECT customer_id, name, interaction_type, interaction_description FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id WHERE interaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY customers.name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT name, email, interaction_description FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id WHERE interactions.interaction_date > '2022-04-01';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_date, notes FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type FROM interactions GROUP BY interaction_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' AND interaction_type = 'email' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers INNER JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id WHERE interaction_type = 'call' AND notes IS NOT NULL ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT note_content, note_date FROM CustomerNotes ORDER BY note_date DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE customer_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'Email' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(feedback_rating) AS avg_rating FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT c.customer_id, c.customer_name, COUNT(n.note_id) AS num_notes FROM Customers c LEFT JOIN CustomerNotes n ON c.customer_id = n.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_id ORDER BY num_notes DESC;
SELECT c.customer_id, c.customer_name, MAX(f.feedback_rating) AS highest_rating FROM Customers c JOIN CustomerFeedback f ON c.customer_id = f.interaction_id GROUP BY c.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_comment FROM Customers JOIN CustomerFeedback ON Customers.customer_id = CustomerFeedback.interaction_id WHERE feedback_rating = 5 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM interactions;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_description FROM interactions;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT agent_name, agent_department FROM agents WHERE agent_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_rating, feedback_comment FROM interactions_feedback WHERE feedback_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, interaction_description FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Complaint' ORDER BY interaction_id ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT customers.customer_name, interactions.interaction_date, interactions.interaction_type FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id WHERE customers.customer_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT agent_name, agent_department, COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM agents JOIN interactions ON agents.agent_id = interactions.customer_id GROUP BY agent_name, agent_department;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(feedback_rating) AS total_rating FROM interactions_feedback GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_rating DESC LIMIT 5;
